name: Brittany Byrne
text: The service was great! Ordered boneless wings and they are drenched in barbecue sauce. The sub was decent. Not what I expected for the price I paid. Ill stick with other pizza places

name: Justyn Michael
text: I ordered some boneless Asian wings to my work today. Order arrived hot and fresh 20 minutes later. I thought it was awesome that they're not only open but handling the rush. This was leaps and bounds better than any other food experience â€¦More

name: Michael Limbrick
text: One of my most favorite pizzas in MI. The quality is too good, and the prices are pretty cheap!

name: Evelyn Long
text: The pizzas are delicious, the portions are huge, the prices are affordable and the service is fast.

name: Jenni Gordon
text: We order weekly! Tonights experience was a true disappointment. Delivery said 40 minutes. It arrived after 1 hour 15 minutes and was luke warm at best. The food tasted like it had sat for too long! We will not be ordering again, anytime soon!

name: Kevin V
text: This location tops it off! Hot and so so succulent. Ham, bacon, pepperoni with a buttery garlic flavored crust. Everything was proportion perfectly to bake optimally. New fav of the chains.

name: Lance Phillips
text: Delicious, quick, cheap. Paul along with other employees are helpful and prompt when taking orders. Consistent in quality. Well run establishment

name: Nick Wolfe
text: The best crust around

text: The service is always fast and accurate. The stuffed crust pizza in phenomenal. Def a household favorite!!

name: Stephanie Robson
text: If your looking to overpay for pizza this is your place! Skimpy toppings and little to no cheese. The stuffed cheese bread was the same way, little to no cheese. Basically a folded piece of dough with pharmesan cheese sprinkled on top. Highly disappointed and will not recommended ordering pizza here.

name: Earl Smith
text: Good for a Hungry Howies and a favorite of my kids, but there are other chains and local establishments that I prefer. I do like their 3 cheese bread. I will say that the staff is usually prompt and courteous. Hungry Howies tend to be take â€¦More

name: Jay Derek
text: Worst service around. Called to order a delivery, Aaron was as rude as can be. I know they get busy, but they can at least be polite. As I was thanking him, he loudly slammed the phone down. Whoever does the hiring here, needs to be fired. â€¦More

name: JP Preston
text: Food is delicious, they sponsored one of our events.  Very community driven, ladies working when we went in were super nice.

We then called them back and was put on hold for 20 mins then was told nothing. Horrible customer service!

text: Spoke to a rude man just now who tried telling me they don't deliver when I have had delivery before from them. Won't be ordering from this place again with rude customer service like that. What's even more sad is the last delivery driver â€¦More
